faqs.question: How are the faculties of GIITS Vishakhapatnam?
faqs.answer: Ans.The Institute has the best faculty team who are highly-qualified with many years of experience. They are dedicated, friendly, and guide the students towards a bright carer.

faqs.question: What are the career opportunities of an MBA fromGIITS Vishakhapatnam?
faqs.answer: Ans.There are a lot of job opportunities after completion of an MBA in Finance. Some of the top job options are Marketing Manager, Brand Manager, Asset Manager, Corporate Sales, Media Planner, Media strategist, Media Manager, and Product Manager.

faqs.question: Is GIITS Vishakhapatnam good?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the college has a marvelous infrastructure and a great faculty team with high academic experience. The students pass out of college with excellent academic results and easily get jobs in reputed firms. Placement and internship opportunities are also available.

faqs.question: Does GIITS Vishakhapatnam provide accommodation facilities?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, the college doesn’t have any hostel facilities there are a lot of hostels nearby the college. Most of the non-local students who are from other places or states reside in the nearby hostels.

faqs.question: How to contact GIITS Vishakhapatnam in case of any queries?
faqs.answer: Ans.You can contact the college by calling 08924 – 240071, 62819 87060 during working hours. The college can also be contacted at principal@giits.in/giitscollege@gmail.com

Section.name: About GIITS
Section.description:
Gonna Institute of Information Technology and Sciences (GIITS) is a private college established in the year 2009 at Vishakhapatnam. It is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada, and has been approved by AICTE. The college offers B.Tech at the UG level, MBA and M.Tech at the PG level, and Diploma programs in Engineering. Admissions to the UG, PG & Diploma courses are based on different state level entrance exams. The college has experienced teaching faculties, good academic facilities for a bright career of students.
Gonna Institute of Information Technology and Sciences offers B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, and Diploma courses. The following table gives details about these courses:
Read more: GIITS Vishakhapatnam Courses and Fees
Gonna Institute of Information Technology and Sciences AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
Admission to the courses is done on the basis of the candidate’s performance in different state level exams. B.Tech admissions are granted on the basis of AP-EAMCET scores. M.Tech and MBA admissions are based on the scores obtained by the students in AP-PGECET and AP-ICET respectively.

Ques. How are the faculties of GIITS Vishakhapatnam?
Ans. The Institute has the best faculty team who are highly-qualified with many years of experience. They are dedicated, friendly, and guide the students towards a bright carer.
Ques. What are the career opportunities of an MBA from GIITS Vishakhapatnam?
Ans. There are a lot of job opportunities after completion of an MBA in Finance. Some of the top job options are Marketing Manager, Brand Manager, Asset Manager, Corporate Sales, Media Planner, Media strategist, Media Manager, and Product Manager.
Ques. Is GIITS Vishakhapatnam good?
Ans. Yes, the college has a marvelous infrastructure and a great faculty team with high academic experience. The students pass out of college with excellent academic results and easily get jobs in reputed firms. Placement and internship opportunities are also available.
Ques. Does GIITS Vishakhapatnam provide accommodation facilities?
Ans. No, the college doesn’t have any hostel facilities there are a lot of hostels nearby the college. Most of the non-local students who are from other places or states reside in the nearby hostels.
Ques. How to contact GIITS Vishakhapatnam in case of any queries?
Ans. You can contact the college by calling 08924 – 240071, 62819 87060 during working hours. The college can also be contacted at principal@giits.in/ giitscollege@gmail.com
